question:
1. A company plans to migrate to Microsoft 365.
You need to advise the company about how Microsoft provides protection in a multitenancy environment.
What are three ways that Microsoft provides protection?

options.0: Customer content at rest is encrypted on the server by using BitLocker.
options.1: Microsoft Azure AD provides authorization and role based access control at the tenant layer.
options.2: Customer content at rest is encrypted on the server by using transport layer security (TLS).
options.3: Microsoft Azure AD provides authorization and role based access control at the transport layer.
options.4: Mailbox databases in Microsoft Exchange Online contain only mailboxes from a single tenant.
options.5: Mailbox databases in Microsoft Exchange Online contain mailboxes from multiple tenants.

question:
2. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
Your company plans to open a new office in the United Kingdom.
You need to provide penetration test and security assessment reports for the new office.
Where can you locate the required reports?

options.0: Data Governance page of the Security and Compliance portal.
options.1: Compliance Manager page of the Services Trust portal
options.2: Data Loss Prevention page of the Security and Compliance portal
options.3: Regional Compliance page of the Services Trust portal

question:
9. Your organization plans to deploy Microsoft 365 in a hybrid scenario.
You need to ensure that employees can use a smart card for authentication.
Which hybrid identity solution should you implement?

options.0: password hash synchronization with single sign on

question:
12. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
An employee requests personal data under General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) guidelines.
You need to retrieve data for the employee.
What should you do?

options.0: Create a data subject request case.

question:
18. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
Users in the IT department must receive new Office 365 preview features before the features are deployed to other users in the company.
You need to ensure only the users in the IT department receive preview features.
Which two actions should you perform?

options.0: Instruct users to navigate to http://insider.office.com and sign up for Office Insider.
options.1: Instruct users to update Office ProPlus.
options.2: In the organizational profile, set the update preference to Targeted release for selected users.
options.3: Instruct users to uninstall Office ProPlus and then reinstall the software.
options.4: In the organizational profile, set the update preference to Standard release.

question:
19. A company is a Microsoft 365 reseller. The company does not provide managed services or direct customer support. You need to provide licenses for customers and earn commissions for each license sold.
What should you do?

options.0: Buy licenses for customers by using the Microsoft admin portal
options.1: Sign up as a Cloud Solution Provider direct reseller.
options.2: Sign up as a Cloud Solution Provider indirect reseller.
options.3: Buy licenses for customers from a Microsoft authorized distributor.

question:
20. A company that has 50 employees plans to purchase a Microsoft 365 Business subscription.
Which two payment methods are available?

21. A company has 250 employees.
You need to migrate all users to Microsoft 365 and meet the following requirements:
✑ Provide a user-centric licensing solution for all users.
✑ Manage devices from a single location.
✑ Minimize licensing costs.
Which licensing model should you use?

22. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
A user experiences an issue with SharePoint Online.
You need to resolve the issue.
Which two options can you use?

options.0: Go to the SharePoint admin center and create a support request.
options.1: Contact Microsoft technical support by telephone.
options.2: Create a new service request from the Microsoft 365 admin center.
options.3: Create a service request from the SharePoint portal.

question:
24. You are a Microsoft 36S administrator for a company.
Microsoft plans to release a new feature for Microsoft Excel.
You need to ensure that the feature becomes available for employees to install as soon as possible To which release channel should you subscribe?

26. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
Your company wants lo team more about what happens if the availability the Microsoft Office 365 services are not met.
Where can you find this information?

29. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
You install Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus on five devices. You deactivate one device.
Which task can you perform on the deactivated device?

options.1: Leave a comment in a document.
options.2: Start a new document from a template.

question:
32. This question requires that you evaluate the bold text to determine if it is correct.
A company needs to protect documents and emails by automatically applying classifications and labels. You must minimize costs. You should implement Microsoft Azure Information Protection for Microsoft Office 365.
Review the underlined text If it makes the statement correct select No change is needed. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.

34. You use Microsoft 365 Usage Analytics.
You need to know the number of users who are active today and were also active last month.
Winch metric should you use?

35. Your organization plans to deploy a subscription-based licensing model of Microsoft Office to devices. You must use group policy to enforce Office application settings.
You need to deploy Office to the enterprise.
Which version of Office should you deploy?

37. An organization plans to deploy Microsoft Office 2019 of Office 365 ProPlus.
What are two advantages of Office 365 ProPlus?

options.0: Features remain constant through the lifetime of the applications.
options.2: A single license may be deployed to multiple devices.
options.3: Fully functional Office mobile apps are free to install and use.

question:
42. A company plans to migrate to Microsoft 365.
Employees must be able to collaborate by using Microsoft Yammer, SharePoint Online, Staff Hub, and Teams. You must minimize costs.
You need to subscribe to Microsoft Office 365.
Which subscription type should you use?

44. You need to identify which Microsoft platforms provide hybrid capacities for migrating from an on premises deployment.
Which two platforms provide hybrid capabilities for migration?

45. A company is moving to Microsoft Azure. Some applications cannot be moved.
You need to identity which application will remain in a hybrid environment after the migration.
Which applications will remain in a hybrid environment?

options.1: applications that use a USB token device to control access
options.2: legacy applications that use a message based interlace
options.3: a new server that runs several line-of business applications

question:
47. A company is purchasing a Microsoft 365 subscription to replace the current on premises IT infrastructure.
You need to identify the impacts of subscribing to Microsoft 365.
Which three outcomes can the company expect?

options.1: Increased Exchange Server Client Access license (CAL) costs
options.2: Increased Windows Server Client Access License (CAL) costs

question:
49. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
The company runs SharePoint Server and Exchange Server in an on-premises datacenter. The site collection for the finance department is currently encrypted using third party software.
You need to move as many services to Microsoft 365 as possible.
What should you do?

options.0: Migrate all SharePoint data and Exchange mailboxes to Microsoft 365.
options.1: Leave SharePoint data for finance department users on-premises. Migrate all other SharePoint data and Exchange mailboxes to Microsoft 365.
options.2: Leave mailboxes for finance department users on-premises. Migrate all other SharePoint data and Exchange mailboxes to Microsoft 365.
options.3: Leave SharePoint data and mailboxes for finance department users on premises. Migrate al other SharePoint data and Exchange mailboxes to Microsoft 365.

question:
51. A company has an Exchange Server environment. The company plans to migrate to the cloud.
You need to recommend a cloud model that meets the following requirements:
✑ Upgrade the existing email environment
✑ Minimize server and application maintenance
Which model should you recommend?

54. A company assigns a Microsoft 365 license to each employee.
You need to install Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus on each employee device.
Which three methods can you use?

options.0: Use System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM) to deploy Office 365 ProPlus from a local distribution source.
options.1: Use System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM) to deploy Office 365 ProPlus from an Office Windows Installer (MSI) package.
options.2: Download the Office 365 ProPlus Windows Installer (MSI) package. Install Office 365 ProPlus from a local distribution source.
options.3: Use the Office Deployment Tool (ODT) to download installation files to a local distribution source. Install Office 365 ProPlus by using the downloaded files.
options.4: Enable users to download and install Office 365 ProPlus from the Office 365 portal.

question:
55. When you enable external access by using the Microsoft 365 admin portal, data is available to anonymous users.
Review the Bold text. If it makes the statement correct, select “No change is needed”. If the statement is incorrect, select the answer choice that makes the statement correct.

options.1: the Everyone group is applied to all shares with full control
options.2: you must configure Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS)
options.3: users can send sharing invitations for specific content

question:
56. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company. You deploy Windows 10 to all devices by using Windows Autopilot.
You need to ensure that employees can install Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus on their devices.
What are two possible ways to achieve this goal?

options.0: Use the self-install option on the Office 365 dashboard
options.1: Download and install the Office ProPlus Windows Installer (MSI) package
options.2: Enable auto-deployment of Office 365 apps for all devices
options.3: Update the Windows AutoPilot deployment profile to include the Office 365 apps

question:
58. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
You need to customize a usage report for Microsoft Yammer.
Which two tools can you use?

options.2: Microsoft Power BI in a browser

question:
60. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for an organization.
A group of employees and users outside the company must be able to collaborate on a project in real time by using a whiteboard.
In the Microsoft 365 admin portal, which Office 365 product should you configure?

61. You need to reduce the amount of time that the IT team spends on user support.
What are three possible ways to achieve this goal?

options.1: Upgrade all client devices to Windows 10
options.2: Use Windows AutoPilot to deploy devices
options.4: Deploy Microsoft Office 365 Professional Plus to all client devices

question:
62. A company has a Microsoft 365 subscription. Employees use personal devices to access company data in the cloud.
You need to restrict employees from copying data to personal OneDrive folders.
What should you use?

63. This question requires that you evaluate the bold text to determine if it is correct.
You use Microsoft Intune for device management. You must determine how many devices run each operating system.
You must launch Intune and navigate to the Mobile Apps blade.
Select the correct answer if the underlined text does not make the statement correct. Select “No change is needed” if the underlined text makes the statement correct.

64. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.You need to ensure that users receive a warning message if they select links in emails that might be unsafe.
What should you do?

options.0: Use Windows PowerShell to install the latest antimalware engine updates
options.1: Enable Microsoft Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection
options.2: Use the Microsoft Exchange Admin Center to configure a new spam-filter policy
options.3: Use the Microsoft Exchange Admin Center to create a new antimalware policy

question:
65. You are a Microsoft 365 administrator for a company. Employees use Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus to create documents.
You need to implement document classification and protection by using Microsoft Azure Information Protection.
Which two actions should you perform?

options.0: Add an Azure subscription to your Microsoft 365 tenant
options.1: Install the Azure Information Protection client
options.2: Create a custom Azure Information Protection policy with the Confidential label
options.3: Enable the default Azure Information Protection policy
options.4: Install the Rights Management Service client

question:
66. A company deploys Microsoft Azure AD. You enable multi-factor authentication.
You need to inform users about the multi-factor authentication methods that they can use.
Which of the following methods is NOT a valid multi-factor authentication method in Microsoft 365?

options.0: Receive an automated call on the desk phone that includes a verification code
options.1: Insert a small card in to a desktop computer and provide a PIN code when prompted
options.2: Receive a call on a mobile phone and select the pound sign (#) when prompted
options.3: Receive an SMS text message that includes a verification code

question:
67. You are a Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
Several users report that they receive emails which have a PDF attachment. The PDF attachment launches malicious code.
You need to remove the message from inboxes and disable the PDF threat if an affected document is opened.
Which feature should you implement?

options.0: Microsoft Exchange Admin Center block lists
options.4: DKIM signed messages with mail flow rules

question:
70. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
All staff must use Microsoft Outlook to access corporate email. When users access Outlook on mobile devices,
they must use a PIN to open the application.
You need to implement a Microsoft Intune policy to enforce the security requirements.
Which policy should you use?

73. A company deploys Exchange Online and SharePoint Online.
You must audit and assessment report for the Microsoft 365 cloud services that the company uses.
You need to provide the required documents.
Which Microsoft site should you use to obtain this information?

76. You are the Microsoft 365 administrator for a company.
Which two admin roles can purchase more licenses?

77. A company plans to purchase Microsoft 365 Enterprise licenses.
Which two options can you use?

options.1: from the Microsoft website using a corporate credit card
options.3: with an Enterprise Agreement (EA) subscription from Microsoft

question:
78. You use Microsoft Business Products.
When you try to create a support request, you receive the following message:
You don't have permission to access this page or perform this action.
You need to determine the cause of the error message.
What is the cause?

options.2: Your company does not have Premier support
options.3: Your account is not a member of the global admin role

question:
79. A company experiences a Microsoft 365 outage that affects an entire region.
You check the Service Health Dashboard and observe that the service is healthy.
You need to find information in Service Health Dashboard that describes what happened during the outage.
What should you use?
Data protection can be selectively applied to applications.
Microsoft Intune can define where corporate data is stored.
Once a device is registered with Microsoft Intune, device wipe will include the user's personal data.
You can manage Azure AD-joined machines by using group policy.
Azure AD requires integration with Active Directory Domain Services by using secure lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP).
Azure AD supports Azure AD Authentication Library (ADAL) authentication.
Users have the same passwords in the cloud and on-premises.
Users must sign in again when using Microsoft 365.
You can configure federated authentication to require a smart card.
You can supplement the default templates to apply restrictive controls.
Classification and protection information is available for on-premises file servers.
Installing the Azure Information Protection client installs an information protection bar to Microsoft Excel.
Intune app protection policies can protect access to Exchange Server on-premises mailboxes.
Intune app protection policies support apps that connect to on-premises Microsoft SharePoint Server.
Intune app protection policies require a mobile-device management (MDM) solution.
You can assign apps to devices that are not enrolled with Microsoft Intune.
You can assign wrapped apps, or apps that incorporate the Intune SDK, only if the device is enrolled with Intune.
You can install available apps from the web-based Company Portal app regardless of whether the device if enrolled with Intune.
After users are enrolled in multi-factor authentication, they must configure a second authentication factor the next time they sign in.
Enabling multi-factor authentication requires an additional subscription purchase.
Complete multi-factor authentication by using text messages, a smartphone app, or a phone call.
Microsoft cloud services offer significant energy savings for Microsoft and its customers.
Lower costs, no hardware maintenance, near-unlimited scalability, and high reliability are all advantages of a private cloud.
Microsoft cloud services offer security options and have the ability to provision resources quickly.
Compliance Manager performs an assessment against your entire Microsoft 365 environment and evaluates both Microsoft and customer controls.
Compliance Manager allows you to assign individuals within the organization to be responsible for the control.
Compliance Manager provides the ability to take corrective actions from within the Service Trust portal.
